DOC.detailed_description: This randomized clinical intervention study cross-over design . The subject randomly allocate one three experimental group : 1 ) control ; 2 ) ASM group aqueous single-phase mouthrinse ; 3 ) OTM group oil-water two-phase mouthrinse . The experimental mouthrinses contain sodium fluoride ASM OTM contain additional ingredient bamboo salt , magnolia bark centella asiatica extract . For OTM , 50 % essential oil add create oil-water two-phase mouthrinse . Subjects instruct use prescribe mouthrinse gargle mouth one minute , twice daily two week . The completion experiment regimen follow 2-week washout period , subject group permutated next mouthrinse trial three group underwent three mouthrinse trial regimen .
